snippet: Investing with dividends in mind has been especially fruitful lately, but some analysts worry that too many people have hopped aboard the bandwagon lately.
abstract: Dividend-paying stocks have become lucrative fad among investors, but some analysts worry that such stocks have become expensive to the point of being risky.
lead_paragraph: Investing with dividends in mind has been especially fruitful lately, but some analysts worry that too many people have hopped aboard the bandwagon lately.

headline.main: How High Should You Be on High-Dividend Stocks?
headline.print_headline: How High Should You Be On High-Dividend Stocks?
